name: Millennium Mall Quetta
description: Millennium Mall Is Quetta's First International Shopping Mall, offering an international-standard shopping and entertainment experience. Featuring a wide range of branded stores, a spacious food court, kids’ play areas, prayer rooms, and multi-level secure parking, it is the perfect family destination for shopping and leisure activities in Quetta.

contact.address: Situated on Shahreh - e - Gulistan, Quetta, Balochistan, Pakistan

name: Gold City Shopping Mall
description: Gold City Shopping Mall on Jinnah Road in Quetta offers a premium shopping experience with a blend of fashion stores, jewelry shops, cosmetics outlets, and a lively food court. It’s a family-friendly mall known for its elegant ambiance, making it a top spot for shopping and dining in Quetta.

contact.address: M.A Jinnah Road, Quetta, Balochistan, Pakistan

name: Delight Mall Quetta
description: Delight Mall Quetta on Toghi Road is an all-in-one shopping, entertainment, and family destination featuring a modern indoor playland, a variety of retail outlets, escalators, elevators, and ample parking. Known for its upscale environment and customer service, it’s quickly become a favorite shopping spot in Quetta.

name: Dawood Shopping Centre
description: Dawood Shopping Centre is a popular retail hub in Quetta, offering a wide range of clothing, ladies’ fashion, kid’s items and home accessories at reasonable prices. With ample parking, home-delivery options, and a vibrant shopping environment, it’s a go-to spot for everyday and occasional shoppers in Quetta.

contact.address: Tola Ram Road, Quetta, Balochistan, Pakistan

name: Safa Shopping Centre
description: Safa Shopping Centre on Tola Ram Road is a leading departmental store and retail mall in Quetta, featuring a variety of garments, beauty products, shoe shops, and accessories. With multiple floors and modern shelving, it’s a preferred destination for fashion-conscious shoppers and families exploring the latest trends in Quetta.

contact.address: Tola Ram Road, Quetta, Balochistan, Pakistan

name: Haroon Shopping Centre
description: Haroon Shopping Centre on Tola Ram Road near Toba Masjid is a modern, climate-controlled retail complex in Quetta, featuring traditional handicrafts, fashion boutiques, children’s apparel, and a food court. With spacious aisles, cultural exhibitions, and convenient hours, it’s a shopper’s paradise offering both local culture and contemporary retail.

contact.address: Tola Ram Road, Near Toba Masjid, Quetta, Balochistan, Pakistan

name: BA Mall
description: BA Mall is one of Quetta's key shopping hubs on Quetta Cantonment. Featuring a diverse mix of branded clothing, ladies’ & kids’ fashion, home decor, electronics, and a food court, it provides a modern, family-friendly shopping experience. With ample parking, clean interiors, and seasonal events, it’s a popular destination for both everyday and occasional shoppers in Quetta.

contact.address: Saite office Near Askari Check Post Air port Road Quetta, Quetta Cantonment, Pakistan

name: Jaan Mall
description: Located on Hali Road in Quetta, Jaan Mall is a vibrant shopping destination featuring over 200 local and international stores. Open daily until late evening, it combines fashion, electronics, traditional Balochi crafts, and a modern food court. With a spacious layout, friendly staff, and regular events, Jaan Mall offers a safe, family-friendly outing in Quetta.

contact.address: Jaan Mall, Hali Road, Quetta, Balochistan, Pakistan

name: A.R Shopping Mall
description: A.R Shopping Mall on Sariab Road is a vibrant retail hub in Quetta, offering clothing, electronics, household goods, and a food court. With wide corridors and ample parking, it’s a top choice for families and everyday shopping in Quetta.

contact.address: Sariab Road (Burma Hotel Chowk), Quetta, Balochistan, Pakistan
